function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Limitation of digital proximity in storing user situations may lead to ineffective COVID-19 tracking.","Impact":"Ineffective data for response, increased risk of infection spread.","Mitigation":"Implement health services personnel, testing services, and GPS-based manual contact tracing infrastructures.","Technologies":"Health services personnel, testing services, GPS-based manual contact tracing infrastructures.","People":"Users of mobile applications, general public.","Owner":"Health organizations, government agencies."},{"Description":"Collection of location and personal data by contact tracing apps threatens fundamental human rights.","Impact":"Violation of privacy, state intrusion into people's lives.","Mitigation":"Ensure transparency, informed consent, and legal oversight of data collection.","Technologies":"Privacy-preserving data collection, encryption, anonymization.","People":"Users of contact tracing apps, general public.","Owner":"Government agencies, regulatory bodies."},{"Description":"Lack of transparency in source code for surveillance applications.","Impact":"Increased risk of security breaches, false sense of security for users.","Mitigation":"Public release of source code, independent security audits.","Technologies":"Open-source code, independent security auditing tools.","People":"Users of surveillance applications, general public.","Owner":"Developers, government agencies."},{"Description":"High number of false positives in Bluetooth tracing apps due to aired Bluetooth chips.","Impact":"Inaccurate contact tracing, reduced effectiveness of app.","Mitigation":"Improvement in Bluetooth technology, algorithmic refinement.","Technologies":"Improved Bluetooth chips, advanced algorithms for distance measurement.","People":"Users of Bluetooth tracing apps, general public.","Owner":"Developers, Bluetooth technology manufacturers."}]}
